title: The NFL Launches a New Mobile Streaming Service, NFL+ (Podcast)
itunes:title: The NFL Launches a New Mobile Streaming Service, NFL+ (Podcast)
description:
Hosts Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Bloomberg Media Reporter Gerry Smith to talk about the NFL's new mobile streaming service, NFL+. The platform will allow users to stream certain NFL games on mobile devices, starting at $4.99 per month.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Hosts Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Bloomberg Media Reporter Gerry Smith to talk about the NFL's new mobile streaming service, NFL+. The platform will allow users to stream certain NFL games on mobile devices, starting at $4.99 per month.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
